items.sentence: I spoke slowly so that they might understand me.
I can no more predict the future than I can fly.
I don't want to intrude on them if they're busy.
I don't really know why, but they don't like me.
I don't feel well. Please give me some medicine.
I know Tom is about three years older than Mary.
I walked quietly, so that they wouldn't hear me.
I make it a rule to get up at six every morning.
I forgot to send New Year's cards to my friends.
Tom said that he was going to clean up his room.
